alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:19PM EDT until July 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR LIVINGSTON COUNTY... At 318 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Grove to near Hartland to near Hamburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Hartland and South Lyon around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, Lakeland, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
